scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Widget-Title}
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Disabled">Email connectivity is currently disabled. Email cannot currently be sent from the community. Please enable email connectivity to restore email related functionality.</resource> <resource name="FrequentSendExceptions">Multiple errors have occurred related to sending email. The email configuration should be verified.</resource> <resource name="FrequentTemplateExceptions">Multiple errors have occurred related to formatting email. The specific exceptions should be reviewed to ensure email templates are properly configured.</resource> <resource name="Healthy">Email is healthy.</resource> <resource name="NotConfigured">Email connectivity is not configured. Email cannot currently be sent from the community. Please configure the SMTP server to use for email.</resource> <resource name="Unknown">The status of email connectivity is not yet known.</resource> <resource name="Widget-Description">Email System Indicator</resource> <resource name="Widget-Title">Email</resource> </language>
